1). Vender should take care of quality and quantity of the order which placed by the customer
 
 2). The quantity & measurement of the item that the customer has ordered should be correct. If there is any kind of mistake in the quantity & measurement. So company will not make payment of that item.
 
 3). Vendors should have to provide original quality product to the customer. If vendors compromise with quality of any item. So company will not pay any cost of that item. 
 
 4). If any of the item is out of stock which is listed in your menu list then you have to inform earlier to our team. I you have not informed then you must arrange the item ordered by the customer .
 
 5).The payment of product will be done by the company to you in cash or account.
 
 6). If you cancel the order after accepting the order, then you have to pay the appropriate prescribed penalty; if you do not give
 the penalty, you will be excluded from the vendor list. 
 7). Within 15 minutes of the arrival of the order, you will have to properly pack the goods and deliver them to the delivery boy.
 
 8). If the price of any goods decreases or increases, you have to inform the company a day before.
